scripts.start: cp node_modules/z3-solver/build/z3-built.js public/ && cp node_modules/z3-solver/build/z3-built.wasm public/ && cp node_modules/coi-serviceworker/coi-serviceworker.min.js public/ && cp node_modules/z3-solver/build/z3-built.worker.js public/ && react-scripts start
